Crystal-Pommed Moogle Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Fey Creature: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.C9CUJHMADBRRQ7KM]{Fey Creature}
  • Extra Language: You can speak, read, and write Farspeak.
  • Reactive Stealth: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.M1E1NFDFV8S282YG]{Reactive Stealth}
